title: Christmas Gift
description: Two sisters, 17-year-old Suzy and 10-year-old Daisy are waiting for Christmas. Daisy believes in Santa and can't wait until she gets her Christmas present, while Suzy doesn't believe in Santa anymore. She is rather concerned about the upcoming Christmas Ball at her school, where she can finally meet her crush Klaus, who is admired by every girl.Suzy constantly tells Daisy that there's no Santa, which makes the little girl sad. But at Christmas night, a miracle happens in their house...The book was originally written in Georgian and translated to English by the 17-year-old author.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
